name: Crystal Pixel - O Resgate
description:
Crystal Pixel - O Resgate 

The story of Crystal Pixel takes place in Bressil a place of peace and tranquility, until one day the Sovereign Gor steals the Crystal Pixel and manages to control all the creatures of the place. It is at this time that two young heroes are summoned to recover the Crystal Pixel bringing peace back to the kingdom of Bressil.
